overview_of_class: Brand Content in a Social World covers the ways that marketing communications use the power of ideas and creativity to build successful brands in traditional, digital and social platforms. The power of a big idea that springs from a true insight into human nature is the key to a brand's success. Students learn how to create, evaluate, nurture and present ideas. The course features innovative assignments designed to bring out the innate creativity in students. In the end, students will have a real-world view of the importance of creativity and the power of ideas in marketing communications.
